definitions.definition: In violation of a moral or other standard , code , or convention ; in an unfair , unjust , dishonest , or immoral manner; unfairly , unjustly , dishonestly , immorally , wrongfully ; wrongly convicted is synonymous with wrongful conviction and miscarriage of justice .

examples: I wrongly assumed that it would be an easy job.

main_definition: In violation of a moral or other standard , code , or convention ; in an unfair , unjust , dishonest , or immoral manner; unfairly , unjustly , dishonestly , immorally , wrongfully ; wrongly convicted is synonymous with wrongful conviction and miscarriage of justice .
